org.gephi.preview.api

Class ManagedRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gephi.preview.api.ManagedRenderer

  • public class ManagedRenderer
extends Object
    Small class that contains a Renderer and its enabled state. Used for managing renderers in PreviewModel.
    Author:
    Eduardo Ramos
    See Also:
    PreviewModel
